text: Luciana Andrea Echeverría Christie (born 12 July 1991 in Cauquenes) is a Chilean actress, singer and television presenter. == Filmography == === Movies === Year Title Character Director 2012 Joven y alocada Chica Sexy Marialy Rivas 2013 Video Club Daniela Pablo Illanes === Television === Year Titre Character Channel 2007−10 Karkú Valentina Urquieta TVN−Nickelodeon 2009 Corazón Rebelde María José "Coté" Colucci Canal 13 2010 Feroz Danae Suicx Canal 13 2010−11 Primera Dama Cristina Santander Canal 13 2011 Témpano Teresa Truman Graun TVN 2011−2012 Su nombre es Joaquín Magdalena Silva TVN 2013 Chico reality Luz Mega ==== Shows ==== * Cubox (Canal 13, 2010) - Herself/Presenter == Other websites == * Category:1991 births Category:People from Maule Region Category:Living people Category:Chilean television actors Category:Chilean movie actors Category:Chilean television presenters Category:Chilean singers
title: Luciana Echeverría
